content.text: How to Set Up Google Analytics
Google Analytics is used to view and understand web traffic.
content.html: Google Analytics is used to view and understand web traffic.

content.text: It is free and easy to use.
content.html: It is free and easy to use.

content.text: You can customize it for many use cases.
content.html: You can customize it for many use cases.

content.text: It works out of the box.
content.html: It works out of the box.

content.text: It is fast to set up. Get your insights today!
content.html: It is fast to set up. Get your insights today!

content.text: Skip reading about Google Analytics. Take me directly to the first step. Go to the first step
content.html: Skip reading about Google Analytics. Take me directly to the first step. Go to the first step

content.text: What is Google Analytics
Google Analytics is a web analytics solution.
content.html: Google Analytics is a web analytics solution.

content.text: It is developed and supported by Google.
content.html: It is developed and supported by Google.

content.text: The newest version is called Google Analytics 4.
content.html: The newest version is called Google Analytics 4.

content.text: It can be used to view data such as audience, page views, sessions and, demographics, and events.
content.html: It can be used to view data such as audience, page views, sessions and, demographics, and events.

content.text: Why enable Google Analytics
Understand your web traffic to make better decisions.
content.html: Understand your web traffic to make better decisions.

content.text: Understand and improve the sales funnel.
content.html: Understand and improve the sales funnel.

content.text: Learn from experimenting (for example, a/b tests).
content.html: Learn from experimenting (for example, a/b tests).

content.text: Google has another solution called Google Optimize. This solution is made for testing.
content.html: Google has another solution called Google Optimize. This solution is made for testing.

content.text: Who is Google Analytics for
Google Analytics is useful for anyone who has a website.
content.html: Google Analytics is useful for anyone who has a website.

content.text: It gives you information about who uses your site and how they interact with it.
content.html: It gives you information about who uses your site and how they interact with it.

content.text: In addition, interface is easy to understand.
content.html: In addition, interface is easy to understand.

content.text: You do not need an analytics background to use and navigate the service.
content.html: You do not need an analytics background to use and navigate the service.

content.text: How to set up Google Analytics step-by-step
Google Analytics can be set up in two ways The Global Website Tag (gtag.js) or Google Tag Manager .
content.html: Google Analytics can be set up in two ways The Global Website Tag (gtag.js) or Google Tag Manager.

content.text: The easiest way is to use The Global Website Tag.
content.html: The easiest way is to use The Global Website Tag.

content.text: This tutorial will use the The Global Website Tag approach.
content.html: This tutorial will use the The Global Website Tag approach.

content.text: Preparations
Decide which code editor to use and set up your environment.
content.html: Decide which code editor to use and set up your environment.

content.text: W3Schools has created an easy-to-use code editor called W3Schools Spaces . Sign up and get started in a few clicks.
content.html: W3Schools has created an easy-to-use code editor called W3Schools Spaces. Sign up and get started in a few clicks.

content.text: Create your index.html file so that you are ready to enter the code.
content.html: Create your index.html file so that you are ready to enter the code.

content.text: All setup. Let's go!
content.html: All setup. Let's go!

content.text: Set up Google Analytics: The Global Website Tag
Step 1: Create a Google Analytics account

links.text: Create an account or sign in to Analytics

content.text: Go to Analytics: Create an account or sign in to Analytics
content.html: Go to Analytics: Create an account or sign in to Analytics

content.text: The link in the paragraph above takes you to the Google Analytics landing page.
content.html: The link in the paragraph above takes you to the Google Analytics landing page.

content.text: Click the "Start for free" button.
content.html: Click the "Start for free" button.

content.text: Step 2: Enter the welcome page
After creating an account or signing in, you are welcomed to the solution.
content.html: After creating an account or signing in, you are welcomed to the solution.

content.text: Press the "Start measuring" button to proceed.
content.html: Press the "Start measuring" button to proceed.

content.text: Step 3: Account setup
You have two decisions to make here.
content.html: You have two decisions to make here.

content.text: One account can have more than one tracking ID. You can track more than one website with an account.
content.html: One account can have more than one tracking ID. You can track more than one website with an account.

content.text: Step 4: Property setup
Property is the service you measure, such as a website, application, link tree, etc.
content.html: Property is the service you measure, such as a website, application, link tree, etc.

content.text: Step 5: Add business information
Analytics uses the information to tailor your experience.
content.html: Analytics uses the information to tailor your experience.

content.text: Step 6: Terms of Service Agreement
Read and understand the terms of service.
content.html: Read and understand the terms of service.

content.text: Tick the GDPR box and click the "I accept" button if you agree.
content.html: Tick the GDPR box and click the "I accept" button if you agree.

content.text: Step 7: Email subscriptions
Step 8: Select platform
Chose the platform where you are collecting data.
content.html: Chose the platform where you are collecting data.

content.text: Then, click the relevant platform to continue.
content.html: Then, click the relevant platform to continue.

content.text: We are continuing with "Web" as the example in this tutorial.
content.html: We are continuing with "Web" as the example in this tutorial.

content.text: Step 9: Data stream setup
Enter data stream details.
content.html: Enter data stream details.

content.text: The enhanced measurement can give the data more context. Improving your understanding of the traffic.
content.html: The enhanced measurement can give the data more context. Improving your understanding of the traffic.

content.text: Step 10: Web stream overview
Here you can see a detailed overview of the web stream.
content.html: Here you can see a detailed overview of the web stream.

content.text: Here are the key takeaways from the overview.
content.html: Here are the key takeaways from the overview.

content.text: 1. Stream URL.
content.html: 1. Stream URL.

content.text: The Stream URL is the link to the connected site.
content.html: The Stream URL is the link to the connected site.

content.text: 2. Measurement ID
content.html: 2. Measurement ID

content.text: The Measurement ID is the identifier for your data stream.
content.html: The Measurement ID is the identifier for your data stream.

content.text: It has a format of G-XXXXXXX.
content.html: It has a format of G-XXXXXXX.

content.text: Google Analytics 4 uses Measurement ID. Older versions use Tracking ID. You can not have both.
content.html: Google Analytics 4 uses Measurement ID. Older versions use Tracking ID. You can not have both.

content.text: 3. Tagging instructions
content.html: 3. Tagging instructions

content.text: Decide to use Global site tag (gtag.js) or Tag manager .
content.html: Decide to use Global site tag (gtag.js) or Tag manager.

content.text: This tutorial will use the Global site tag.
content.html: This tutorial will use the Global site tag.

content.text: Installing the Global site tag is the easiest and quickest way of getting it up and running.
content.html: Installing the Global site tag is the easiest and quickest way of getting it up and running.

content.text: Step 11: Global site tag (gtag.js)
Click the "Global site tag (gtag.js)" row.
content.html: Click the "Global site tag (gtag.js)" row.

content.text: Here you can see a code snippet.
content.html: Here you can see a code snippet.

content.text: The code snippet is a script to allow Google to measure data on your site.
content.html: The code snippet is a script to allow Google to measure data on your site.

content.text: You can see the Measurement ID in the second last line in the code snippet.
content.html: You can see the Measurement ID in the second last line in the code snippet.

content.code:
<!-- Global site tag (gtag.js) - Google Analytics -->

<script async src="https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtag/js?id=G-DNJN1PF3CS"></script>

<script>
window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
function gtag(){dataLayer.push(arguments);}
gtag('js', new Date());

gtag('config', 'G-XXXXXXX');
</script>
content.code_html:
<!-- Global site tag (gtag.js) - Google Analytics -->
<script async src="https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtag/js?id=G-DNJN1PF3CS"></script>
<script>
window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
function gtag(){dataLayer.push(arguments);}
gtag('js', new Date());

gtag('config', 'G-XXXXXXX');
</script>

content.text: Step 12: Enter the code snippet
Copy the code snippet.
content.html: Copy the code snippet.

content.text: Make sure to include your Measurement ID.
content.html: Make sure to include your Measurement ID.

content.text: Locate the <head> tag in your HTML.
content.html: Locate the <head> tag in your HTML.

content.text: Paste the code snippet just below the <head> tag.
content.html: Paste the code snippet just below the <head> tag.

content.text: Save and publish the code.
content.html: Save and publish the code.

content.text: We used W3Schools Spaces in this example.
content.html: We used W3Schools Spaces in this example.

content.text: Step 13: Test that it works
Ensure that you have successfully saved and published the code snippet with the correct Measurement ID.
content.html: Ensure that you have successfully saved and published the code snippet with the correct Measurement ID.

content.text: Open the URL for the site you have connected to the data stream.
content.html: Open the URL for the site you have connected to the data stream.

content.text: Click on "Real time" on the menu to the left.
content.html: Click on "Real time" on the menu to the left.

content.text: Confirm that you see yourself as an active user.
content.html: Confirm that you see yourself as an active user.

content.text: Congrats. You have successfully enabled Google Analytics for your site!
content.html: Congrats. You have successfully enabled Google Analytics for your site!

content.text: Explore Google Analytics
Recommended related topics are Tag manager and Events
content.html: Recommended related topics are Tag manager and Events

content.text: Spend time in the service to learn about your user activity, commerce, demographics, device, and referrals.
content.html: Spend time in the service to learn about your user activity, commerce, demographics, device, and referrals.

content.text: Tip: Ever heard of W3Schools Spaces? It is a personal space where you can make a website from scratch or use a template and host it for free.
content.html: Tip: Ever heard of W3Schools Spaces? It is a personal space where you can make a website from scratch or use a template and host it for free.

content.text: It has everything you need in the browser.
content.html: It has everything you need in the browser.

content.text: Get started in a few clicks.
content.html: Get started in a few clicks.

content.text: * no credit card required
content.html: * no credit card required
